channel.title: News
channel.description: A simple blog for news and all things like this. If you want to contact me, you can do this with one of the addresses on the front page.

item.title: Broken Windows Build
item.description:
The build for windows was broken for a few days now, sorry!
I’ve uploaded a fixed build.

Please drop me a mail if something doesn’t work.

PS: I think you will like to hear that I’ve started working on a modus for games over network. Shouldn’t take toooo long...

item.title: Network Games
item.description:
It’s boring to play against yourself or against a friend next to you, I know this.

I have plans to implement network gaming in Netwars so that it’s possible to play against friends (Or other people) over the internet.

But please give me some time, it’s a big job, and I’m only one person and I have only two hands - I’m not that fast.

(If anyone wants to help me, just contact me!)

item.title: Progress of Netwars
item.description:
I want to describe everything around this project a bit.

I’m currently the only developer of this project, I’m a student and I really don’t have very much free time. This means that the development on Netwars is slow. Very slow.

Also, building Netwars for Windows is not so trivial, and I don’t want to do this process every day. So the Windows version lags behind the Mac version, which is easy to build.
